name: Doohickey
description: Doohickey is a creative marketing company located in Jacksonville Beach, Florida.They specialize in graphic design, printing, website design, website development, video production, audio production, email marketing, creative strategy, Google AdWords, WordPress, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Search Engine Marketing (SEM), Inbound Marketing and Social Media Marketing. They meet deadlines, make you look good, and make your life easier
